skills.name: Install Sequelize
skills.pattern:
npm install sequelize
npm install pg pg-hstore # for PostgreSQL
npm install mysql2 # for MySQL

skills.name: Create Instance
skills.pattern:
const { Sequelize } = require('sequelize');
const sequelize = new Sequelize('postgres://user:pass@localhost:5432/dbname');

skills.name: Connection Options
Define Model
Model Class
Data Types
skills.pattern: DataTypes.STRING, INTEGER, BIGINT, FLOAT, DOUBLE, DECIMAL, BOOLEAN, DATE, DATEONLY, TEXT, JSON, JSONB, BLOB, UUID, ENUM

skills.name: Column Options
Validations
HasOne
skills.pattern:
User.hasOne(Profile);
Profile.belongsTo(User);

skills.name: HasMany
skills.pattern:
User.hasMany(Post, { foreignKey: 'authorId' });
Post.belongsTo(User, { foreignKey: 'authorId' });

skills.name: BelongsToMany
skills.pattern:
Post.belongsToMany(Tag, { through: 'PostTags' });
Tag.belongsToMany(Post, { through: 'PostTags' });

skills.name: Create
skills.pattern: const user = await User.create({ name: 'John', email: 'john@example.com' });

skills.name: Bulk Create
skills.pattern: await User.bulkCreate([{ name: 'John' }, { name: 'Jane' }], { validate: true });

skills.name: Find All
skills.pattern: const users = await User.findAll({ where: { active: true }, order: [['createdAt', 'DESC']], limit: 10 });

skills.name: Find One
skills.pattern:
const user = await User.findOne({ where: { email: 'john@example.com' } });
const user = await User.findByPk(1);

skills.name: Update
Delete
Operators
skills.pattern:
const { Op } = require('sequelize');
where: { age: { [Op.gt]: 18 }, status: { [Op.in]: ['active', 'pending'] } }

skills.name: Eager Loading
Attributes
skills.pattern: await User.findAll({ attributes: ['id', 'name', [sequelize.fn('COUNT', sequelize.col('posts')), 'postCount']] });

skills.name: Aggregations
Group By
Transaction
Managed Transaction
Hooks
skills.pattern:
User.beforeCreate((user) => { user.email = user.email.toLowerCase() });
User.afterCreate((user) => { console.log('Created:', user.id) });

skills.name: Scopes
Raw Query
Migrations
skills.pattern:
npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --name create-users
npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo

skills.name: Sync Database
skills.pattern:
await sequelize.sync(); // create tables
await sequelize.sync({ force: true }); // drop and recreate
await sequelize.sync({ alter: true }); // alter existing
